summary: This document is a report from the NSA relaying the official Cuban statement on the death of President Kennedy, as communicated by Ambassador LECHUGA, expressing sorrow despite the existing antagonism between the Cuban and U.S. governments.
summary_one_paragraph: On November 24, 1963, the NSA disseminated a report relaying the official Cuban government's response to President Kennedy's assassination. The message, sourced from Havana and communicated through Ambassador LECHUGA, expresses deep sorrow for Kennedy's death despite the antagonistic relationship between Cuba and the United States. This statement was circulated to numerous Cuban diplomatic missions across the globe, including those in Accra, Algiers, Athens, and various other cities, reflecting Cuba's formal acknowledgment of the event.
title: 2X/0/CUD/T2421-63: Official Cuban Statement on Death of President
